attributes.action: replace all current road vehicles with custard powered dodgems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the growing problem with pollution and gobal warming, I beleive that the replacement of all current road vehicles with custard powered dodgems would greatly reduce green house gasses and help slow down global warming. And, also, it would make driving much more fun too.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
